metadata.name: ETHDenver 2023
metadata.description: WittyPixelsTM collaborative art canvas #1 drawn by 1921 attendees during ETHDenver 2023 in National Western $SPORK Castle. This token was fractionalized and secured by the [Witnet multichain oracle](https://witnet.io). Historical WittyPixelsTM game info and authors' root can be audited with [Witnet's block explorer](https://witnet.network/search/b9d56f8e178fab41f0d497ac3d2cd6c943d33977f92ca8adfb602512a4eb6975). See actual donations in [Etherscan](https://etherscan.io/address/0x07a286be56d1a769cabf4f47882c9ea1383a5544?fromaddress=0x462b572089d3176c1b916aabe24bc23de459f5e1). Up to 50% of the $ETH from the first auction sale is to be donated to the [TheGivingBlock's Ukraine Emergency Response Fund](https://thegivingblock.com/campaigns/ukraine-emergency-response-fund/). The rest will be distributed to players proportionally to the $WPX fractions they hold on the [WittyPixelsTM official dapp](https://wittypixels.art).
